amendment.description: An amendment numbered 45 printed in Part C of House Report 118-559 to prohibit funds to administer, implement, or enforce the Memorandum on the Deferred Enforced Departure for Certain Palestinians, issued by the President on February 14, 2024.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 204 - 203 (Roll no. 291).

action.text: Pursuant to clause 6(h) of rule XVIII, the votes of the Delegates and Resident Commissioner were decisive on the previous vote and a separate vote in the House was required.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 208 (Roll no. 290).

action.text: House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A021) Failed by recorded vote: 206 - 208 (Roll no. 290).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Ogles amendment (A021) Agreed to by recorded vote: 204 - 203 (Roll no. 291).
